WorkItem.Description:
Look at checkbox for this setting in MS Office Excel under the header/footer settings.
 
Test (using attached sample file):
----
$reader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader('Excel2007');
$excel = $reader->load('read.xlsx');
 
$sheet = $excel->getActiveSheet();
var_dump($sheet->getHeaderFooter()->getAlignWithMargins());
 
Expected result:
----
bool(true)
 
Actual result:
----
bool(false)
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.6.6
WorkItem.Summary: getAlignWithMargins() gives wrong value when using PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007
